name: The WALLRIDE Hand-Tracking Hands-On DEMO for getting Handsy (with your hand-tracking devices)
name_original: The WALLRIDE Hand-Tracking Hands-On DEMO for getting Handsy (with your hand-tracking devices)
description:
Utilize futuristic Oculus Quest technology from the year 2021 to gesture-ize your human meat-paws into other stuff to do virtual stuff in this ground-breaking dang demo!

- PUNCH hot Toast!
- LOSE at Rock, Paper, Scissors against an actual Robot!
- SLING Tacos into Mouths!
- BLAST Pickle-people with Shootey-Hands!

Requires Oculus Quest, with Hand Tracking enabled. Play it! or Don't.
developers: W A L L R I D E
